title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 751.3 - Administrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 751.3 - Administrator

State Regulations

The operator shall appoint an administrator whose
training and experience is related to the services provided at the center, and
who shall have executive authority and responsibility for the operation of the
center. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
751.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
